code: import{useQuery}from"react-query";import Http from"./http.api";var MainUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_MAIN_URL;var GetInstrumentsUrl=MainUrl+"api/Instrument/GetAllInstruments";var getAllInstruments=function getAllInstruments(){return Http.get(GetInstrumentsUrl).then(function(res){return res.data.result;}).catch(function(err){return;});};export var useAllInstruments=function useAllInstruments(){return useQuery("instruments",getAllInstruments,{retry:1,retryDelay:500,refetchOnWindowFocus:false});};
